thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Sally & Charlie Hollister Wilbraham, Ma.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Sally & Charlie Hollister Wilbraham, Ma.

author: Sally & Charlie Hollister Wilbraham, Ma.
title: Sally & Charlie Hollister Wilbraham, Ma.
text:
We have used Town Fair Tires in Enfield,Ct. for many transactions over recent years. We always receive a great welcome and exceptional service from the entire staff. You bring the feeling of old fashioned customer service, something lost in our present business world.
Sally & Charlie Hollister Wilbraham,Ma.
